summary: This is an email dated August 11, 2019, regarding Jeffrey Epstein's Bureau of Prisons records (BEMR). It is sent to/from an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York and is marked confidential, indicating internal prison communication about Epstein's incarceration.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email and the attached Bureau of Prisons records; identified by his inmate registration number 73618-054.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 11, 2019, concerning Jeffrey Epstein's Bureau of Prisons (BEMR) records.
Epstein is identified by his federal inmate registration number: 73618-054.
The communication involves the Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and originates from the SDNY (Southern District of New York).
The email references multiple attached files containing parts of Epstein's BEMR records.
